howToPlay.title: How to Play 3D Snake
howToPlay.toggleViewDesc: Switch between <1>first-person</1> and <1>third-person</1> camera views during gameplay.
howToPlay.audioSettingsDesc: Toggle game music and sound effects, or open the settings to tune into live radio stations.
howToPlay.objectiveDesc: Navigate the grid, collect nodes to grow your snake and increase your score. Avoid crashing into walls or your own tail!
howToPlay.turn90Desc: Press once to make a sharp turn.
howToPlay.turn180Desc: Quickly press the same direction twice to make a U-turn.
howToPlay.sidestepDesc: Quickly press opposite directions to shift one lane over.
howToPlay.nodesDesc: Collect these nodes scattered across the grid to gain points, grow, and activate special abilities.
howToPlay.proTipDesc: Keep an eye on the city skyline. When you see a building with active searchlights, it's a signal that a rare, powerful node has just spawned in the outer street passage. Time your route carefully to grab it!

nodes.dataDesc: The primary energy source. Collect these to score points, increase your speed, and grow longer.
nodes.overdriveDesc: Temporarily doubles your current speed. Use with caution at high velocities!
nodes.stasisDesc: Instantly reduces your base speed, making high-speed navigation more manageable.
nodes.tractorDesc: Pulls nearby Data Nodes towards you for a short period.
nodes.multiplierDesc: Doubles the points gained from each Data Node for a limited time.
nodes.forkDesc: For a short duration, each Data Node collected spawns three more and triples your growth.
nodes.aegisDesc: A rare node found in the outer passages that grants an extra life.

pi.joinDescription1: This isn't about getting rich overnight. This is about building something real, together.
pi.joinDescription2: The Pi Network is a social crypto project, a unified effort to create a digital currency that's accessible to everyone, everywhere.
pi.joinDescription3: We're not just mining coins on our phones; we're joining a global community of people who believe in a future where we have a say in our own financial destiny.
pi.joinDescription4: By joining with my link, you're not just getting a bonus Pi coin, you're becoming a founding member of a new digital economy.
pi.joinDescription5:
You're part of the team, a team that's pioneering the next step in the future of finance.

This is for all of us, by all of us.

aboutSpi.title: About Spi vs Spi
aboutSpi.desc: Spi vs Spi is a massively multiplayer online game where strategy, espionage, and mini-games collide on the Pi Network. Steal intelligence (ELINT), defend your network, and rise through the ranks in a persistent digital world.

whatsNew.title: Development Updates
whatsNew.newIntro: We've been busy shipping updates thanks to your amazing feedback!
whatsNew.nextIntro: We're committed to the long-term growth of the game and its utility within the Pi ecosystem. Here's a sneak peek at what we're working on!
whatsNew.visionP1: At its core, creativity is the human superpower. It's that unexplainable spark that separates us, allowing us to build, dream, and innovate in ways no other creature can. My core philosophy is to harness this spark by constantly seeking connection, the threads between the powerful digital tools of our age and the universal rhythms of human experience.
whatsNew.visionP2: Innovation isn't just about creating something from nothing; it's about seeing a classic idea and reimagining it through a modern lens. 3D Snake: Neon Grid Runner is born from this mindset. It’s more than a nostalgic game wrapped in a neon aesthetic, it's a practical demonstration of this connection.
whatsNew.visionP3: But the true vision extends beyond the gameplay. We understand that for the Pi Network to truly flourish, it needs more than just internal utility. The most powerful pi apps will be those that act as a bridge, a vibrant, welcoming gateway for the world outside.
whatsNew.visionP4: Our goal is for someone who has never even heard of Pi to play this game for its sheer entertainment value, and through that enjoyable experience, seamlessly discover the real-world power and potential of this decentralized currency.
whatsNew.visionP5: This is what it means to be 'More Than a Game.' It's an on-ramp, a playful first step into the Pi ecosystem, designed to prove the utility of a decentralized future, one neon grid at a time.
